hero_header: ASSOCIATION OF VOLUNTEER TEAMS OF UKRAINE
hero_slogan: VOLUNTEERS FOLLOWING THE CALL OF THE SOUL ‚Äì EITHER YOU FIGHT OR YOU HELP!
overview_text: A brief description of the mission, goals, and projects...
news_item_1_title: Delivery of Combat Drones to Our Defenders
news_item_1_text: Today, together with the parish priest of the Parish of the 'Presentation of the Blessed Virgin Mary' Serhii Petlenko, the NGO 'Association of Volunteer Teams of Ukraine', and all those who contributed to the fundraiser, we delivered combat drones to our defenders. Each drone means saved lives and brings us closer to our Victory. Together we are an unbreakable force! üí™
news_item_2_title: Assistance for the 'Bratstvo' Unit of the Defence Intelligence
news_item_2_text: Today, we delivered humanitarian aid to the Main Directorate of Intelligence ‚Äî the 'Bratstvo' unit. Thanks to your support and donations, we purchased and delivered: 2 EcoFlow devices for charging electronics in the field, 2 Starlink kits to improve communications, and a camouflage net for additional protection. This is an important contribution to the efficiency of our intelligence officers and the safety of our defenders. We sincerely thank everyone who contributed! Together ‚Äî to victory!
about_text_1: The Public Union "ASSOCIATION OF VOLUNTEER TEAMS OF UKRAINE" is a community that includes both legal organizations engaged in active volunteer activities, volunteer teams, regardless of the number of their activists, and individual volunteers.
about_text_2: The main goal of AVTU is to unite efforts and interactions to increase the potential of the volunteer movement to provide powerful support to the Armed Forces of Ukraine and help citizens affected by the criminal military aggression of the Russian Federation.
about_text_3: Close mutual support among volunteers of ALL GENERATIONS BY THE CALL OF THE SOUL is daily practical steps towards the earliest VICTORY and active post-war revival of Ukraine!
about_text_4: AVTU was founded based on many years of active volunteer activities of individual volunteers and patriotic public organizations that are currently part of the union, since the very beginning of the Russian Federation's aggression against Ukraine in 2014.
about_text_5: The unifying foundation and co-founders for the creation of the PU "AVTU" in the fateful year of 2022 were:
about_list_3: NGO "INTELLECT - CLUB OF CIVILIZATIONAL DEVELOPMENT OF UKRAINE"
about_list_4: NGO "INSTITUTE OF FORMATION AND DEVELOPMENT OF CIVIL SOCIETY "DIGITAL VECH"
